Home.name: Home
Home.description:
You built this cabin with your own hands after moving to this town this year, the year of 1666.

A few months after, this town was struck by illness, and strange creatures roam it's perimeter.

Pray thee discovereth the causeth... and stopeth...it

Center Courtyard.name: Center Courtyard
Center Courtyard.description:
These poor villagers, they are very troubled by these recent happenings.

Just look at them, they're pitiful...err, I mean, frightened.

I must speak with them.

Northern Square.name: Northern Square
Northern Square.description:
Why are those children on that roof? Strange times indeed.
Is that blood on the boy's lip and the girl's hands?
Are their eyes red?

You must be seeing things...

Southern Square.name: Southern Square
Southern Square.description:
Not much to see here. Seems like somebody got lazy with this area.

Are those buildings falling down?

Dreadful sight to see.

Farm.name: Farm
Farm.description:
What a beautiful... is that a WEREWOLF!??

Why is farmer John not terrified?? He seems so calm. Too calm...

He must be one of them...

Town hall.name: Town hall
Town hall.description:
An uncharacteristically jovial (for this town's present state of affairs) looking clerk is busy with paperwork.

They seem... incomplete. Like there's a piece of them missing...

You can't put your finger on why though...

Tavern.name: Tavern
Tavern.description:
Business seems to be booming here. You suppose that the ever looming threat of dark forces incomprehensible to mortal souls reigning down upon existence will do that for a pub...

Just a hunch though.

Church.name: Church
Church.description:
The further north you go, the more dilapidated the town appears. There must be something in those woods. But what?...

Maybe this priest knows something.

Well.name: Well
Well.description:
The air is remarkably colder here. There's been shrieks at night here. The sky seems to have become dim.

To the North the tall trees block out the light and there is only the sound of creaking wood and the rustle of leaves.
The well is a rough stone circle with a seemingly bottomless pit in the center. Search it?

Woods.name: Woods
Woods.description:
'I've been watching you.'
'I know who you are and why you've come.'
'But you canâ€™t stop me now!...

...wait, is that the Water Stone of the Void!? I must act quickly.'
The beast begins to murmur an incantation.
Do something!
Woods.description2:
This must be the cat the villagers were talking about.
Looks like a normal cat...although, you do feel a chill course through your veins as it peers at you as if piercing your soul...
Kill it with fire?
